references.paper_title: InstructPix2Pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper is the foundation upon which the current research builds, proposing a supervised model for instruction-based image editing that the current work improves upon.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is a crucial component of the current research, providing semantic alignment between images and text instructions for improved editing coherence.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, the underlying latent diffusion model used in the current research, enabling high-quality image generation and manipulation.

references.paper_title: Prompt-to-prompt image editing with cross attention control
references.reason: Prompt-to-Prompt, introduced here, is a key technique used in creating training data for several other important references and is discussed in the current work's background.

references.paper_title: MagicBrush: A manually annotated dataset for instruction-guided image editing
references.reason: This paper introduces a high-quality dataset for image editing that is compared against the current method's performance.
